popular_fflags.description: [CONFIRMED] Sets the maximum framerate cap for the client.
[CONFIRMED] Unlocks the 240 FPS limit in the built-in task scheduler.
[CONFIRMED] Enables extended framerate cap options in the settings menu.
[CONFIRMED] Controls how many frames are buffered to reduce input latency.
[CONFIRMED] Minimum number of parallel Lua GC worker tasks.
[CONFIRMED] Enables render thread validation for multithreaded rendering.
[INTERNAL] Performs internal sanity checks on render thread state.
[CONFIRMED] Uses a higher precision timer for scheduling and frame timing.
[CONFIRMED] Controls how many parallel runtime tasks may execute.
[INTERNAL] Internal engine task scheduling tuning value.
[EXPERIMENTAL] Forces Vulkan as the preferred graphics backend when available.
[CONFIRMED] Forces Direct3D 11 as the preferred rendering backend.
[EXPERIMENTAL] Disables Direct3D 11 to force Vulkan or OpenGL fallback.
[INTERNAL] Forces D3D11 Feature Level 10 for legacy GPU compatibility.
[INTERNAL] Enables compute shaders on D3D10-capable hardware.
[CONFIRMED] Prevents crashes when minimizing the client while using Vulkan.
[CONFIRMED] Forces the client to select a specific GPU by name.
[CONFIRMED] Forces the Metal renderer on macOS devices.
[CONFIRMED] Disables Vulkan rendering support entirely.
[CONFIRMED] Enables instanced rendering to reduce D3D11 draw calls.
[CONFIRMED] Allows manual overriding of texture quality levels.
[CONFIRMED] Sets forced texture quality (0=Low, 3=High).
[CONFIRMED] Skips mipmap levels to reduce VRAM usage.
[CONFIRMED] Limits how many texture compositor jobs can run concurrently.
[CONFIRMED] Scales down resolution of composite avatar textures.
[INTERNAL] Overrides legacy part texture packs prior to 2022 materials.
[INTERNAL] Overrides modern part texture packs for 2022 material system.
[INTERNAL] Overrides legacy terrain material textures.
[INTERNAL] Overrides modern terrain material textures.
[CONFIRMED] Enables compression for HTTP asset requests.
[CONFIRMED] Internal slice size for terrain voxel arrays.
[CONFIRMED] Maximum number of assets to preload into memory.
[CONFIRMED] Enables Material Service refactor for improved memory handling.
[CONFIRMED] Optimizes vertex buffers for mesh rendering efficiency.
[CONFIRMED] Sets compression aggressiveness for internal buffers.
[CONFIRMED] Controls shadow darkness multiplier.
[EXPERIMENTAL] Pauses voxel lighting updates to reduce GPU load.
[CONFIRMED] Fade distance for voxel-based lighting transitions.
[CONFIRMED] Enables physically-based light falloff calculations.
[CONFIRMED] Maximum number of local light updates per frame.
[CONFIRMED] Minimum number of local light updates per frame.
[CONFIRMED] Fade-in time for light updates in milliseconds.
[CONFIRMED] Improves GPU light culling performance.
[EXPERIMENTAL] Forces legacy voxel lighting over Future/ShadowMap.
[CONFIRMED] Enables refactored lighting shaders for better performance.
[INTERNAL] Clamps material roughness to reduce reflection cost.
[EXPERIMENTAL] Forces highest-quality Future lighting pipeline.
[CONFIRMED] Forces ShadowMap lighting mode.
[EXPERIMENTAL] Forces SSAO regardless of graphics settings.
[CONFIRMED] Controls resolution levels used for SSAO.
[CONFIRMED] Disables all post-processing effects.
[CONFIRMED] Replaces skybox with flat gray color for performance.
[CONFIRMED] Maximum distance terrain grass is rendered.
[CONFIRMED] Minimum distance before grass begins rendering.
[CONFIRMED] Controls density of grass strands.
[CONFIRMED] Base distance used for CSG LOD switching.
[CONFIRMED] Distance threshold for CSG LOD level 1 to 2.
[CONFIRMED] Distance threshold for CSG LOD level 2 to 3.
[CONFIRMED] Distance threshold for CSG LOD level 3 to lowest.
[CONFIRMED] Number of LODs generated for CSG v2 meshes.
[CONFIRMED] Minimum triangle count before CSG LOD reduction occurs.
[INTERNAL] Forces internal Fast Rendering Model quality level.
[CONFIRMED] Sets default graphics quality level on launch.
[CONFIRMED] Restricts maximum object render distance.
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables dynamic resolution scaling to maintain FPS.
[CONFIRMED] Optimizes physics updates for moving assemblies.
[CONFIRMED] Enables Constructive Solid Geometry v2 system.
[CONFIRMED] Minimum distance before facial animation LOD applies.
[CONFIRMED] Maximum distance for facial animation rendering.
[INTERNAL] Disables ScreenGui rendering for benchmarking.
[CONFIRMED] Enables Shift+G and related GUI hide shortcuts.
[CONFIRMED] Enables modernized in-game escape menu.
[CONFIRMED] Enables autocomplete in the developer console.
[CONFIRMED] Enables automatic chat translation settings.
[CONFIRMED] Enables global wind simulation system.
[CONFIRMED] Controls physics behavior during lag spikes.
[CONFIRMED] Sets network MTU size for client packets.
[CONFIRMED] Skips splash screens to launch games faster.
[CONFIRMED] Size in MB of local asset cache.
[CONFIRMED] Displays constant FPS overlay.
[CONFIRMED] Sets maximum camera zoom-out distance.
[CONFIRMED] Forces all meshes to use lowest LOD.
[CONFIRMED] Enables parallel command encoding for the render pipeline.
[CONFIRMED] Number of parallel tasks used for render command encoding.
[CONFIRMED] Enables GPU occlusion queries to skip hidden geometry.
[EXPERIMENTAL] Batch size for occlusion query processing.
[EXPERIMENTAL] Uses updated heuristics for asset streaming decisions.
[CONFIRMED] Target radius around camera for high-detail asset streaming.
[CONFIRMED] Radius for low-priority asset streaming.
[CONFIRMED] Allows entire physics islands to sleep when inactive.
[CONFIRMED] Threshold used to determine island sleep state.
[EXPERIMENTAL] Uses faster but less precise contact resolution.
[CONFIRMED] Enables incremental Lua garbage collection.
[CONFIRMED] Controls how aggressively Lua GC runs per step.
[EXPERIMENTAL] Allows Lua GC sweep phase to run in parallel.
[CONFIRMED] Bundles multiple small packets into larger ones.
[CONFIRMED] Maximum size of bundled network packets.
[CONFIRMED] Moves audio mixing work to a dedicated thread.
[CONFIRMED] Buffer size in milliseconds for audio mixer.
[CONFIRMED] Batches text rendering to reduce UI draw calls.
[CONFIRMED] Maximum number of text glyphs per batch.
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables periodic heap compaction to reduce fragmentation.
[CONFIRMED] Disables water reflections and advanced waves.
[CONFIRMED] Disables atmospheric fog rendering.
[EXPERIMENTAL] Activates advanced shadow rendering techniques for improved realism. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables color grading for artistic visual effects and ambiance. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Enables multi-threaded physics calculations for better performance on multi-core processors. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Uses mipmaps for textures, improving performance while reducing visual popping at various distances. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables tessellation for higher detail in 3D models at closer distances. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Enables client-side prediction for smoother gameplay in fast-paced online games. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Adds a blur effect to the skybox for more atmospheric visuals. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Enables texture streaming to reduce memory usage by loading textures as needed. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables soft-body physics for more realistic object deformations. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Activates real-time reflections for enhanced realism in reflective surfaces. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Allows multiple layers of clothing to be worn at once, providing more customization. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables a dynamic day-night cycle for more immersive environments. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Implements packet loss recovery for a smoother experience in low-quality networks. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Enables skinned mesh rendering for smoother character animation. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Adds realistic fluid dynamics for water and other liquids in the game. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Activates post-processing effects like bloom and lens flares for cinematic visuals. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables sun shaft effects for more realistic sunlight scattering. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Compresses voice chat for reduced bandwidth usage while maintaining clarity. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Activates screen-space reflections for real-time mirror-like effects. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Adds customizable gravity fields for unique gameplay effects. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Adds volumetric clouds for a more immersive and dynamic sky. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Synchronizes emote animations across all players for better multiplayer experiences. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Compresses scripts during runtime to save memory and improve load times. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Adds directional blur effects to simulate high-speed motion. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables tiled deferred lighting for more efficient light handling. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Asynchronous fluid simulation for better performance during high load. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables depth of field effects for more cinematic visuals. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Optimizes bone cache to improve animation performance. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Enables adaptive network data compression based on network conditions. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Uses global illumination for more realistic lighting. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Compresses textures during streaming to reduce memory usage. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables motion blur effect for smoother movement visuals. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Dynamically unloads assets from memory when not needed. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Adds ambient occlusion for better shading and realism. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Adjusts LOD bias for avatar streaming to balance performance and visual quality. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables object fracture simulation when broken. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables volumetric lighting effects for a more dynamic scene. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Optimizes particle collisions with physics objects for better performance. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Adds lens flare effect for bright light sources. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Uses low-latency prediction to improve responsiveness in fast-paced games. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Adds lens distortion effect for a cinematic visual style. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Caches avatar appearances to speed up subsequent loads. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables reflections on 3D objects for realism. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Reduces the number of physics substep iterations to improve performance. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Adds rain effects to the lighting system for dynamic weather. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables high-quality reflections for a more realistic appearance. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Duplicates assets in memory for faster load times. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Enables asynchronous compute shaders for faster GPU processing. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Moves physics broadphase calculations to a separate thread. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Loads avatar parts asynchronously to reduce initial load times. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Reduces streamed texture detail when far from camera. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Improves player movement smoothness using predictive interpolation. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables ray-traced shadows for higher visual fidelity. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Offloads avatar skinning calculations to GPU. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Sets maximum VRAM used by textures to prevent GPU thrashing. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Turns off volumetric fog for performance gain. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Uses optimized rendering for UI elements. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Simulates particle systems asynchronously. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Adjusts physics solver iterations dynamically based on load. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Loads lower LODs of avatars at distance to improve performance. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables Temporal Anti-Aliasing for smoother visuals. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Adjusts shadow map resolution based on camera distance. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Runs collision checks asynchronously to reduce frame spikes. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Loads audio assets asynchronously during gameplay. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables Screen-Space Reflections for improved realism. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Offloads distant avatar culling to GPU. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables volumetric clouds in lighting system. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Reduces frequency of memory GC for smoother gameplay. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Physics objects start in sleep state to reduce initial load. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Post-processing effects run asynchronously for better FPS. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Reduces interpolation delay for networked avatars. [CONFIDENCE]
[EXPERIMENTAL] Enables bloom post-processing effect. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Adjusts mipmap level bias for streamed textures. [CONFIDENCE]
[CONFIRMED] Stabilizes graphics quality selection logic.
